description:
Some of the Quantum plugins will need to know more information when creating a network and port.  For networks, they will need to know what nova cluster the information is coming from.  For ports they will need to know: nova id, rxtx information, and vm identifier so that it can set up networking appropriately.

Review here: https://review.openstack.org/#change,2264
title: Pass additional information from nova to Quantum

comments.content: Fix committed in trunk, not in milestone-proposed yet.
